go_data.justification: G13 is involved in signaling from lysophosphatidic acid receptor via epidermal growth factor receptor to Rho.
G13 mediates signaling from lysophosphatidic acid receptor via epidermal growth factor receptor to Rho.
Activation of G12/G13 is sufficient to induce platelet shape change.
G12/G13 activation results in MLC phosphorylation through Rho-mediated activation of Rho-kinase.
G13 is involved in cell signaling from lysophosphatidic acid receptor via epidermal growth factor receptor to Rho.
